name: 勇闯地下城 Crossing Dungeon
description:
• About this game
• [Background Introduction]
• The story takes place on the Durian planet. The protagonist Victor was born in a small village. The entire Durian planet is under the rule of a monster Mondor gang. People need to offer food and resources to keep them safe. The people complain, but the monsters The Mundo gang is very powerful, and people suffer from helplessness and can only surrender to the suppression of the Mundo gang.
• The protagonist Victor and his friends bravely enter the dungeon together!
